name: SureBright
headline: Apple Care-like warranty program for every retailer
description:
SureBright lets e-commerce merchants embed "Apple Care” like product warranties into their checkout flows in less than 10 minutes. Our AI-powered warranty platform generates incremental revenue and boosts customer loyalty at zero cost to the merchant.

Sanket led engineering at PolicyBazar, an insurance tech company that IPOed and is valued at over $8B. Manish worked at Amazon and has built $100M ARR products, handling over 180B requests per day.

Until now, finding the right policy for any product and pricing it at the right price wasn’t possible at scale. We automated this process using LLM and have unlocked a $50B+ opportunity. Each month, over 5 million consumers view SureBright warranty offers.
tags: industry:fintech; industry:e-commerce; industry:insurance; industry:retail; industry:ai; location:new-york

founders.name: Manish Chauhan, Founder
founders.description:
Manish is the CEO and co-founder of SureBright. He holds an MBA from INSEAD (France) and an MMath (CS) from the University of Waterloo, where he researched and published on low-latency real-time systems.

He has previously worked at Amazon and startups like Applyboard, where he built products handling over 180 billion requests per day, contributing to $100M+ in ARR.

founders.name: Sanket Munjal, Co-Founder
founders.description: CTO & Co-Founder @ SureBright. Led Engineering at an InsurTech, PolicyBazaar.com that went public (8Bn USD). 2x Founder. Ex-Philips, Ex-Samsung

# Turbocharge your business performance
Imagine boosting your Average Order Value by 14% almost overnight while also sharing revenue on every product protection policy sold. With SureBright, you get expertly crafted strategies and innovative tools designed to drive business growth and foster customer trust.
# Convert customers into brand ambassadors
Elevate casual shoppers into lifelong brand champions through post sale product warranty offerings and our exceptional customer support. With SureBright, you'll not only retain loyal customers but also ignite a cycle of positive reviews and valuable referrals.
[ Get in touch with us ](https://surebright.com/</partnerWithUs>)
![Customer as brand ambassadors](https://surebright.com/_next/image?url=%2FLandingPage%2FconvertCustomers.png&w=1200&q=75)
# On-brand customization
From color schemes to button shapes and even fonts, we provide agile customization options to ensure every feature integrates seamlessly with your brand aesthetic. We're all ears for your customization needs, making sure our service feels like an organic extension of your brand.
# Our objective is to assist businesses in achieving secure sales growth

# Advantages for Customers
#### Great Coverage
![icon](https://surebright.com/LandingPage/negative.svg)
Your customers experience total peace of mind with our comprehensive warranty plans for your products that cover everything from accidental spills to unexpected breakdowns.
#### 24X7 Support
![icon](https://surebright.com/LandingPage/positive.svg)
#### Easy and 100% Digital Claim Filing
![icon](https://surebright.com/LandingPage/positive.svg)
[ Schedule a Demo ](https://surebright.com/</scheduleDemo>)
![Surebright Coverages](https://surebright.com/LandingPage/customerAdvantage/sb_great_coverage.svg)
# How Merchants Drive Net-profits and Increase Customer Satisfaction
![Icon](https://surebright.com/LandingPage/icons/benefitSection/noCoding.svg)
## No Coding Required
Boost sales effortlessly, with zero need for coding. Integrate accident protection and extended warranties directly on your product page.
![Icon](https://surebright.com/LandingPage/icons/benefitSection/locationArrow.svg)
## Single-click Revenue Driver
Offer warranties with just a single click on your product pages, ensuring a seamless upsell experience for your customers.
![Icon](https://surebright.com/LandingPage/icons/benefitSection/shield.svg)
## Premium Insurance Partners
Partner with SureBright and access a network of North America's leading insurance providers trusted by industry leaders like Amazon and Walmart. Guranteed premium policies for your customers at unbeatable prices.
![Icon](https://surebright.com/LandingPage/icons/benefitSection/thumbsUp.svg)
## Your Own Success Manager
Imagine having a personal guide for your Shopify journey. With us, you get a dedicated Client Success Manager who understands your needs and goals.
![Icon](https://surebright.com/LandingPage/icons/benefitSection/merchantPortal.svg)
## Revenue Tracking via Merchant Portal
Take charge with our user-friendly dashboard that offers live revenue tracking and customizable control over warranty offers.
![Icon](https://surebright.com/LandingPage/icons/benefitSection/customer.svg)
## Increase Customer Satisfaction
Our hassle-free warranty options translate to satisfied customers, fostering loyalty and increasing your chances of repeat business.
# Frequently asked questions
Welcome to our FAQ section, where we've compiled a comprehensive list of commonly asked questions and their succinct answers. Save time and find quick solutions to your queries right here.
MerchantsCustomers
#### Why are SureBright's extended warranty plans advantageous for merchants?
![Icon](https://surebright.com/LandingPage/negative.svg)
Integrating SureBright Extended Warranty Plans into your offerings serves a dual purpose. Firstly, it enhances your overall revenue and profits through a revenue-sharing model where you get a significant margin on each policy sold through your platform. Secondly, it enhances customer confidence by offering them peace of mind against potential future repair or replacement costs.
#### How can merchants profit from selling SureBright extended warranty plans?
![Icon](https://surebright.com/LandingPage/positive.svg)
#### How do SureBright's extended warranty plans differ from standard manufacturer's warranties?
![Icon](https://surebright.com/LandingPage/positive.svg)
#### How quick and easy is the integration process with SureBright?
![Icon](https://surebright.com/LandingPage/positive.svg)
# Have more questions? We are here to help.
Our dedicated support team is here to assist you every step of the way, ensuring a seamless and hassle-free experience.
[Get in touch with us](https://surebright.com/</partnerWithUs>)

# How Merchants Drive Net-profits and Increase Customer Satisfaction
![Icon⟨60⟩]
## No Coding Required
Boost sales effortlessly, with zero need for coding. Integrate accident protection and extended warranties directly on your product page.
![Icon⟨61⟩]
## Single-click Revenue Driver
Offer warranties with just a single click on your product pages, ensuring a seamless upsell experience for your customers.
![Icon⟨62⟩]
## Premium Insurance Partners

![Icon⟨63⟩]
## Your Own Success Manager
Imagine having a personal guide for your Shopify journey. With us, you get a dedicated Client Success Manager who understands your needs and goals.
![Icon⟨64⟩]

Take charge with our user-friendly dashboard that offers live revenue tracking and customizable control over warranty offers.
![Icon⟨65⟩]
## Increase Customer Satisfaction
Our hassle-free warranty options translate to satisfied customers, fostering loyalty and increasing your chances of repeat business.

Secondly, it enhances customer confidence by offering them peace of mind against potential future repair or replacement costs.

generated_description:
SureBright is a startup founded in 2022, currently operating out of New York and part of Y Combinator’s Batch S24. The company's mission? To revolutionize the warranty experience for retailers with a sleek, Apple Care-like program that is easy to implement. They allow e-commerce merchants to embed warranty services directly into their checkout process—think of it as offering peace of mind with just a click.

The technology behind SureBright is impressive. They've utilized AI, particularly large language models (LLMs), to automate and streamline the often cumbersome task of finding and pricing warranties at scale. This innovation has enabled them to tap into a massive opportunity, claiming a market potential exceeding $50 billion. Currently, over 5 million consumers interact with SureBright's warranty offerings each month.

The team leading this charge has a strong pedigree. Sanket, who spearheaded engineering at PolicyBazar—a major insurance tech company valued at over $8 billion—brings a wealth of experience. Meanwhile, Manish has an impressive background from Amazon, where he developed products generating $100 million in annual revenue and processed over 180 billion requests daily.

SureBright's platform is designed to be merchant-friendly, requiring no coding to integrate and promising a seamless upsell for customers. Retailers can see an increase in their Average Order Value by as much as 14% alongside shared revenue on each warranty policy sold. With customization options available, the service can be tailored to match each merchant's branding seamlessly, helping businesses build customer loyalty and trust.

What’s more, SureBright covers a broad array of product categories. From cell phones to wellness equipment, its warranty options cater to diverse markets. And with a dedicated support team, SureBright ensures that both merchants and customers feel cared for throughout their experience.

In summary, SureBright is tackling the warranty space with a blend of cutting-edge technology and user-centric design, aiming not just to provide warranties, but to create a seamless experience that enhances profitability and customer satisfaction along the way. Want to learn more? Check them out at [surebright.com](https://surebright.com).
